job_purpose: Responsible for designing, developing, deploying, and maintaining the company's digital platforms, with a focus on corporate websites to reflect the quality and professionalism of engineering and structural services.
job_duties_and_responsibilities: Design, build, and maintain the company's website ensuring security, responsiveness, and optimal performance
Implement new features aligned with user and business needs
Develop custom themes, templates, and plugins for CMS platforms like WordPress
Ensure website is up to date with security patches and software updates
Monitor and improve site performance including load time, SEO rankings, and accessibility
Collaborate with various teams to integrate technical project content into the website
Provide technical support and advice on digital communication tools
Keep up with emerging web technologies and propose improvements to digital infrastructure
Recommend UX/UI enhancements based on analytics and user feedback
Ensure compliance with accessibility standards and SEO best practices
required_qualifications: Proven experience in front-end web development
Experience with React, Vue.js, or Angular
Strong understanding of responsive design, cross-browser compatibility, and web accessibility
Competence in using Git or similar version control systems
Attention to detail and structured coding approach
Problem-solving skills and ability to meet deadlines
preferred_qualifications: Experience in engineering, construction, or technical service firms
Familiarity with SEO, Google Analytics, and performance monitoring tools
Basic graphic design or UI/UX design skills
Knowledge of web security best practices and GDPR compliance
Understanding of AEC industry and communication needs
UI/UX experience for B2B websites or client dashboards
company_details: Regional Group is a leading name in the Australian piling sector, offering cost-effective and environmentally responsible turnkey solutions for geotechnical drilling and piling needs. The company values excellence, safety, and commitment to delivering specialised geotechnical solutions across various sectors.
